official_title: A Randomized Trial Comparing the Adenoma Detection Rates Between EndoRings Colonoscopy (EC) and Standard Colonoscopy (SC).
inclusion_criteria:
* Screening or Surveillance Colonoscopy
* Able to provide written informed consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
exclusion_criteria:
* Known narrow colon or colon stenosis
* Personal history of Colorectal cancer
* History of inflammatory bowel disease
* Familial adenomatous polyposis syndrome (FAP)
* Hyperplastic polyposis syndrome
* Referral for incomplete colonoscopy or polyp clearance
